go_data.justification: Slc26a7 participates in Cl- transport in Reissner's membrane epithelial cells.
Slc26a7 functions as a Cl- channel.
Slc26a7 is localized to the basolateral membrane of Reissner's membrane epithelial cells.
The involvement of SLC26A7 in cellular pH regulation in other epithelial cells leaves open the possibility that SLC26A7 is needed in Reissner's membrane cells during perturbations of pH.
Slc26a7 contributes to the anion conductance of Reissner's membrane epithelial cells.
